Arms Master Challenge.name: Arms Master Challenge
Arms Master Challenge.flavor: You lash out at foes within reach, and then call out another enemy a short distance away.
Arms Master Challenge.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Arms Master Challenge.secondaryeffect: Choose one enemy within 5 squares of you other than the primary target or the secondary target. You mark that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Subjugation of Steel.name: Subjugation of Steel
Subjugation of Steel.flavor: Spinning in a tight circle, you viciously attack the enemies surrounding you.
Subjugation of Steel.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Subjugation of Steel.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Tempered in Blood.name: Tempered in Blood
Tempered in Blood.flavor: Calling upon years of brutal conditioning, you fight off the pain of a wound with pure willpower.
Tempered in Blood.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack
Tempered in Blood.effect: After the attack is resolved, you use your second wind.
